about_the_game:
Farm Garden Simulator is a farm simulator game where you can grow a lot of crops and raise animals.

- Grow a variety of crops
You can get coins by growing crops, raising animals, harvesting, and selling them in the market.
You can use the coins you collect to purchase seeds for other crops, and as you level up, the types of crops you can grow will increase, and the farmland you can unlock will expand.
Increases the number of animals you can keep.

・Use coins and jewelry
Collected coins and jewelry can be used to obtain various farm tools and tractors.
Farm tools and tractors allow you to efficiently plow many farms at once.
In this game, after planting crops, when the game is started after some time has passed, the crops are completed and can be harvested.

・Types of crops that can be grown
　Apples, apricots, asparagus, bananas, beans, beets, broccoli, cabbage, carrots, cherries, corn, cucumbers, eggplants, hemp, lemons, lettuce, onions, oranges, peaches, pears,
pepper, plum, potato, pumpkin, Italian pumpkin, white pumpkin,
Squash Butternut, Squash Delicator, Strawberry, Sunflower, Tomato, Watermelon, Wheat, etc.

・Types of animals that can be kept
"Cats, dogs, pigs, cows, chickens, horses, etc.

Farm Garden Simulator is a farm simulator game where you can grow a lot of crops and raise animals.

- Grow a variety of crops
You can get coins by growing crops, raising animals, harvesting, and selling them in the market.
You can use the coins you collect to purchase seeds for other crops, and as you level up, the types of crops you can grow will increase, and the farmland you can unlock will expand.
Increases the number of animals you can keep.

・Use coins and jewelry
Collected coins and jewelry can be used to obtain various farm tools and tractors.
Farm tools and tractors allow you to efficiently plow many farms at once.
In this game, after planting crops, when the game is started after some time has passed, the crops are completed and can be harvested.

・Types of crops that can be grown
　Apples, apricots, asparagus, bananas, beans, beets, broccoli, cabbage, carrots, cherries, corn, cucumbers, eggplants, hemp, lemons, lettuce, onions, oranges, peaches, pears,
pepper, plum, potato, pumpkin, Italian pumpkin, white pumpkin,
Squash Butternut, Squash Delicator, Strawberry, Sunflower, Tomato, Watermelon, Wheat, etc.

・Types of animals that can be kept
"Cats, dogs, pigs, cows, chickens, horses, etc.
name: Farm Garden Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Farm Garden Simulator is a farm simulator game where you can grow a lot of crops and raise animals.
